publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-764# Dennis Canavan: Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs-That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement by the Chancellor of the Exchequer regarding a minimum 80% relief from business rates for registered community amateur sports clubs and believes that the Scottish Executive should ensure that such relief is extended to registered community amateur sports clubs in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Elaine Smith*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Richard Lochhead*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Chris Ballance*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Linda Fabiani*, John Swinburne*, Eleanor Scott*, Alex Neil*, Christine May*

S2M-764# Dennis Canavan: Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs-That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement by the Chancellor of the Exchequer regarding a minimum 80% relief from business rates for registered community amateur sports clubs and believes that the Scottish Executive should ensure that such relief is extended to registered community amateur sports clubs in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam, Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, Elaine Smith, Dr Elaine Murray, Richard Lochhead, Michael Matheson, Stewart Stevenson, Chris Ballance, Mike Pringle, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Ms Sandra White, Linda Fabiani, John Swinburne, Eleanor Scott, Alex Neil, Christine May, Robin Harper*, Michael McMahon*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Gordon Jackson*, Bill Butler*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Janis Hughes*, Dr Jean Turner*, Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*, Kate Maclean*, Marlyn Glen*, Margo MacDonald*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Cathie Craigie*
S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Fiona Hyslop*, Tommy Sheridan*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Irene Oldfather*
S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Sarah Boyack*

S2M-764# Business Rate Relief for Community Amateur Sports Clubs (lodged on 7 January 2004) Helen Eadie*
